headline: Is Interactive Brokers (IBKR) Using GlobalTrader Upgrades to Redefine Its Retail Growth Narrative?
summary: Earlier this month, Interactive Brokers launched a redesigned IBKR GlobalTrader mobile app, adding faster navigation, forecast contracts access, AI-generated news summaries, and a revamped Explore section that helps investors find opportunities across global markets. The upgrade, together with recent platform enhancements and new UAE equities access, underscores Interactive Brokers’ push to broaden its appeal to both newer and experienced investors worldwide. We’ll now examine how the...
